price: 78. Ne savent-ils donc pas qu’Allah Connaît leur secret et leurs confidences, et qu’Allah est le Suprême Connaisseur des secrets insondables ?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alam yaʿlamū anna al-laha yaʿlamu sirrahum wanajwāhum wa-anna al-laha ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
